summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated July 24, 2019. It records inmate counts by housing unit and includes a roster entry for inmate 78107-054, who is listed under a 'SUICIDE' category with an assignment of 'HOSP' (hospital). The document appears to be routine prison administrative paperwork from the day Jeffrey Epstein was in custody.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate 78107-054 on the inmate roster under 'HOSP' (hospital) assignment with a 'SUICIDE' category notation.

events.title: Daily Prison Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, with Jeffrey Epstein listed in the hospital unit under a suicide watch category.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated July 24, 2019, which is during Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration prior to his death.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as inmate 78107-054 with an assignment of 'HOSP' (hospital) and a category notation of 'SUICIDE'.
The document is a routine Bureau of Prisons count sheet showing inmate population by housing unit at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The 'SUICIDE' category on Epstein's roster entry indicates he was under suicide watch protocols at the time.
Multiple official count slips are included, showing the standard prison administrative procedures for tracking inmates.
